title: New: Earl – Chum
body:
Wow.

In all the average band hype of 2012, I’d forgotten just how good a rapper Odd Future wonderkid **Earl** is. Rapping over a choppy, piano based beat, his flow is as slick as ever; bringing an 80’s style vibe to _Chum_. Whilst it’s not quite on the same level as the highlights of his debut LP, it’s far more worthwhile than anything else **Odd Future** have put out in the last 8 months. Check out Chum below.
